structure.unit: STOCK AND MUTUAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANIES (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 656.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Application for life insurance to be attached to policy if it has bearing on contract; use as evidence; photostatic copy.
